data.title: Henderson and Sebree, Kentucky
data.meta_description: Tomblinson Funeral Homes provides funeral, memorial, personalization, aftercare, pre-planning and cremation services in Henderson and Sebree, Kentucky.
data.text:
Who We Are

Our funeral homes and monument company are locally and family owned/operated. With seven licensed funeral directors and four licensed insurance agents on staff, you can rely on us to provide your family with professional service and care in your time of need. Our knowledge, compassion, and attention to detail ensure your loved one will be honored and remembered in a meaningful way. Every step of the way, we are here to help you feel at ease during the most difficult time.

We are dedicated to giving back to the community and are involved in many community events, including school programs, non-profit events, fundraising, and many more. Our entire staff live, worship, shop, and take part in activities centered around the very people who support us.

We will continue to strive in providing our families with kindness and compassion in an environment that feels like home. We are committed to providing professional and personalized service to meet the needs of each family we serve.

Services We Offer

Our full service funeral facilities offer a wide array of services ranging from the most basic of cremations to traditional funeral services with burials to follow. Our knowlegdable staff is also available to help with any prearrangement needs including making selections and setting up prepayment options.

Our friendly monument staff is also available to assist with selections of granite and bronze memorials as well as benches, mausoleums, date inscriptions on existing monuments and many other needs.

We are dedicated to providing personalized, professional and compassionate services to help lighten your burden and support you through the difficult times that follow the loss of a loved one. We're honored to assist you in your time of need, and would like to assure you that we'll do everything in our power to make your experience a meaningful and memorable one.
